thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Bowery Hanbee Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good deal if you have business in the area
thread.title_full: Good deal if you have business in the area - Review of BEST WESTERN Bowery Hanbee Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: TomM1951
title: Good deal if you have business in the area
text:
The rooms are not fancy but are clean. They have a work station in the rooms, which is critical if you are staying for business. Beds are comfortable enough. Breakfast buffet is about what you would expect: edible but nothing special. Wifi is a little slow but okay.
Lots more room than midtown.
